snippet.title: Playstation gets its own skin condition
snippet.description: ...While critics of video games like to claim that playing too many video games is bad for your health, doctors have affirmed that playing games for extended periods of time can create rather painful sores on a person's hands. As a result, doctors have labeled this condition "PlayStation palmar hidradenitis," something that Sony is sure to be thrilled about.According to the BBC, the B...

snippet.title: EA and Bioware detail iPhone Mass Effect title, officially
snippet.description: ...Bioware doesn't seem too happy that news of the iPhone Mass Effect title was released before the company was ready, but in a recent post on the game's official forum the details were made official, and all the rumors were put to rest.
